sentences.en: Dry Mouth Saliva lubricates the mouth, dehydration reduces the amount available.
sentences.cn: 口腔唾液顺利口干 、 脱水量可削减.

sentences.en: He noticed a lot of saliva settling in his mouth.
sentences.cn: 他注意到有很多唾液滞留在他的嘴里。

sentences.en: He wiped a dribble of saliva from his chin.
sentences.cn: 他擦掉了下巴上的几滴口水.

sentences.en: In land animals, saliva contains mucus, and provides lubrication for food in the alimentary canal.
sentences.cn: 陆上动物的唾液内有粘液, 并对消化道内的食物起着润滑作用.

sentences.en: Michael was showing the nurse how to suction his saliva.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔正给护士示范如何把他的唾液吸出来。

sentences.en: Mumps virus can be isolated from saliva, urine, and, in meningitis, from the cerebrospianal fluid.
sentences.cn: 流腮病毒可自唾液及尿中分离出来, 患脑膜炎时, 病毒则可来自脑脊髓液.

sentences.en: Now drips the saliva, will become tomorrow the tear.
sentences.cn: 现在流的口水, 将成为明天的眼泪.

sentences.en: Now drips the saliva, will becoming tomorrow the tear.
sentences.cn: 目前淌的哈喇子, 将成了明天的眼泪.

sentences.en: Saliva dribbled from the baby's mouth.
sentences.cn: 唾液从婴儿的嘴里流了出来.

sentences.en: She tried to spit in Michael's face but she had no saliva.
sentences.cn: 她拼命想往迈克尔脸上吐口水,但是她把嘴说干了,吐不出口水来.

sentences.en: The accumulation of unswallowed saliva in the pharynx causes the sensation of choking.
sentences.cn: 不能咽下的唾液积聚在咽部引起窒息感.

sentences.en: The saliva in our mouths is secreted from the salivary gland.
sentences.cn: 我们口中的唾液都是由唾液腺分泌出来的.

sentences.en: There was an excess of saliva in his mouth.
There was the slow, fresh, saliva - stimulating smell of looking cotton seeds.
sentences.cn: 有煮棉籽时慢慢散发的, 清新的, 令人垂涎欲滴的气味.

sentences.en: Would you mind checking it to see if it matches the saliva from our spitting champ?
sentences.cn: 你能查一下这个是否符合我们吐口水大王的唾液 么 ?

words.tran_cn: 分泌唾液；流涎症；汞中毒
使流涎；使过量分泌唾液

trans.tran_en: the liquid that is produced naturally in your mouth
